PageInfo.Message:
In battles against large war-ready types, it is
important first to <COL ffdc78>destroy all the war
armor worn on the body. </COL>
Similar to small war-ready types, the more war
armor attached to the body, the greater the
increase in combat power through war armor.

The main attack methods effective against the War
Ready are as follows:

1. Attacks with high Blow Power
2. Concentrated attacks with teammates

If a concentrated attack with teammates is
successful, the red cracks will shine even
brighter, making it easier to destroy the War
Ready for a certain period of time.

Furthermore, when a skill with a <COL
ffdc78>healing effect</COL> comes into contact
with the war ready armor that is glowing red, or
when captured by <COL ffdc78>Element Archer's
Magick Eye: True Aid</COL>, the armor's repair
ability is disabled, making it even easier to
destroy through concentrated attacks.

Additionally, <COL ffdc78>healers also have the
characteristic of being able to inflict damage on
the war ready armor with white cracks.
</COL>Understanding the role of healers and
cooperating with them can be said to be an
important approach in battles against war ready
armor types.

By destroying the war-ready armor, you can expose
the weak points hidden underneath the armor, just
like in the case of smaller types of war-ready
armor, and greatly deplete the enemy's health.

Furthermore, by completely destroying all the
war-ready armor, you can seize the maximum
opportunity for attack and take the enemy down.
<COL ffdc78>In battles against war-ready armor
types, prioritizing the destruction of the armor
becomes the key to victory.</COL>
